overview:
For the last 15 years, Cory served as President of San Francisco-based Triadigm Technology, a technology firm focused on developing mission critical, SME (Small/Medium Enterprise) web solutions. During his tenure, Triadigm delivered several hundred broadband, digital media, and LAN/WAN/ASP/ web-based applications. Cory was also the inventor of ContentPathÂ®, a middleware framework and content management system, which has been deployed with hundreds of customers for use in social networking, commerce/retail, advertising, affiliate marketing, mobile technology, streaming & broadband media, user community, intranet, and portal applications.

Cory began his career with Andersen Consulting and has worked with leading firms including IBM, DEC and Pioneer. Cory graduated from Northwestern University with honors.

Source : Marinsoftware.com
